meanings.sent1: She preferred an unflamboyant style, choosing simple and practical clothes.
meanings.sent2: The room was decorated in an unflamboyant manner, with neutral colors and minimal decorations.
meanings.sent3: His unflamboyant outfit stood out among the crowd of brightly dressed party-goers.
meanings.sent4: Her unflamboyant personality shone brightly in a sea of loud and attention-seeking individuals.
meanings.sent5: The unflamboyant design of the building made it blend seamlessly into the surrounding architecture.

meanings.sent1: The car's unflamboyant exterior hid its powerful engine under the hood.
meanings.sent2: His unflamboyant speech was filled with sincerity and genuine emotion.
meanings.sent3: Despite his unflamboyant appearance, he had a secret talent for flamenco dancing.
meanings.sent4: The unflamboyant garden surprised visitors with its hidden beauty and intricate details.
meanings.sent5: Her unflamboyant jewelry collection sparkled subtly, catching the light in a delicate way.
